article.headline: Ohio 81, American 50
article.story: ATHENS, Ohio (AP) -- Sonny Troutman scored 18 points and Ohio placed four players in double figures in an 81-50 victory over American on Saturday. Jeremy Fears had 12 points and six assists for the Bobcats (2-0), who held the Eagles to 39.6 percent shooting. Troutman and Mychal Green hit 3-pointers as the Bobcats opened the game with a 12-2 run. Jeff Halbert made a 3 with four seconds left in the first half to give Ohio a 42-26 lead at the break. Halbert and Green both scored 11 points for the Bobcats, who finished 12-for-26 from behind the arc. Ohio used a 20-4 run in the second half to open up a 73-40 lead with 7:08 left. Fears made a jumper, converted a layup and hit two free throws during the spurt. Brayden Billbe and Andre Ingram scored 10 points apiece for the Eagles (0-5). The Bobcats shot 48 percent from the field and outrebounded American 42-28.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
